A.羅拔圖馬天尼斯 B.朗奴高文

1. 可能性來講
兩個都係國家隊教頭
來緊下一年就有歐國盃玩
唔覺得佢地好有誘因會放棄個機會走來一隊陷入危機既巴塞
尤其是高文上任荷蘭其實都係一年 咩大賽都唔玩就走好似怪怪地
不過呢
2. 球會角度講
巴塞鍾意請自己友 戰術因素又好 傳統傳承又好
朗奴高文係名宿 而且係重量級嗰隻
廿年前亦都喺度做過助教
感情上巴塞呢隊波應該幾
馬天尼斯應該只係加泰人呢個身份係令佢地考慮
3. 真係戰術上講 簡單講
愛華頓時期既馬天尼斯的確係有啲Positional play既元素
而比利時既佢亦都係一早玩返三中堅既
佢喺戰術潮流上一向走得幾前
朗奴高文則係荷蘭試過用一個4231進攻同442防守既策略應付法國
好似會近似啲現時巴塞既踢法
4.戰績上
馬天尼斯玩盃賽 其實幾叻
但佢教親都係唔大規模既球會
朗奴高文十幾年前玩歐聯成績都係帶住過三隊波入八強直至到教華倫西亞傻撚左
講經驗朗奴高文執教大球會既經歷更多
但近年佢都係教中遊波overachieve先比人讚

其實依度無點提過，報紙又無特別提，但其實影到對利個場落後緊時美斯有屌過球員（或者唔係屌個種，但係有行去同成班人講野）。今季對畢爾包個場都屌過（個場真心算屌）主席無神神衝上黎打前，唔理後防。仲有就係對里昂俾人入咗一球後，逐個上前安撫同鼓勵球員 依d報紙無提過，但有俾人影到

-Messi hiding all problems, after all he’s Messi, gives the impression everything’s fine until the UCL collapse comes.
-Valverde is a mediocre, mid table coach backed by the players, who are comfortable and lazy without a demanding manager, everyone’s hiding behind Messi carrying the team.
-Huge debt, healthy for now, but there’s a worrying €150m loan from an American fund, and the Camp Nou reforms are coming which will exceed €800m no matter what the board says. Paying it will be tough and taxing on the club’s long term finances post Bartomeu.
-Deadweight players refusing to leave or having next to no market value, and the wage bill, which is the highest in the world, completely unstable and unsustainable, blocking more big signings like De Ligt for now.
-Coutinho is already the biggest financial disaster in a form of a transfer in the club’s modern history. His agent is trying to move him, but no fools trying to buy him, yet.
-Player power is rampant, Bartomeu deciding to keep Valverde after the club captains asked him to, leaking to the media he’s acting level headed. Part of the board completely against the coach staying, went as far as contacting Roberto Martinez behind the president’s back and leaking it to the media. Pep Segura is another problem he wants to keep.
-An ageing squad which most of what used to be key players are now over 30 and becoming an expensive issue. Valverde can’t be trusted with a transitional period, he’s simply not capable of it.
-Hashtag campaigns on social media have no effect on the board, who manipulate public opinion of the voting members through the local newspapers. A successful motion of censure to remove the board is nearly impossible because of the conditions for it to happen, sadly.
-Players like Parejo and Rodrigo being linked as possible new signings, enough said.

Anyway, Messi is Messi, and the club’s likely to have another successful season domestically, that’s what he does. It’s made easier considering Real Madrid are on pitch in a worst situation at the moment. Remember this next time you call Barça fans entitled, the club can do much better if they had competent management. “We have Messi” standards aren’t every other big club standards.

Messi’s been hiding all of the poor management decisions Barcelona’s made since Rosell was elected back in 2010. I worry the club’s shape will be as bad as Manchester United post Sir Alex Ferguson are right now, but no use panicking or worrying for things that may happen 5 years in the future, especially knowing a well intentioned and incredibly competent man like Victor Font could become club’s president in 2021 with Xavi as coach.

This isn’t about pessimism or optimism, but analysing the club’s situation objectively. Good intentions are the first step to make things right, after all.

It was an intense season. We achieved our objective to win the La Liga, and this time with a significant gap over our rivals.

It’s the end of my fifth year and now with 190 matches wearing the blaugrana colours with pride. It’s an honor that you are chanting my name the way you do it! Thank you for the support behind my goal, the support on away games, the way you treat and respect my family and me in this special city. Your support is felt beyond the field of play.
I’m looking forward to the summer vacation to rest and clear my head. I wish you all a great summer! 🙂

奧巴馬借美斯鼓勵年輕人https://sports.now.com/mobileweb/news/details?id=25712647256

【Now Sports-體育】美國前總統奧巴馬以美斯為例子，勉勵年輕人即使天才也未必能贏世界盃，不要自暴自棄。

阿根廷球星美斯（Lionel Messi）在國際賽大賽從未染指獎盃，看來已經是全地球人都知道的事，就連前美國總統奧巴馬也知道他的事跡。他在訪問中勉勵年輕人說：「即使是有口皆碑的天才，他們也要跟其他人合作，才能建立自己的風格。」

奧巴馬繼續說：「在阿根廷國家隊，就算美斯是多麼完美，卻還是贏不到世界盃。所以，我給年輕人的建議是坦然面對現實，很少人能憑一己之力獲得巨大成就。」

但求阿根廷今夏能贏得美洲國家盃冠軍，不然美斯將仍然被政客們掛在嘴邊。不過，奧巴馬最大成就不過獲得諾貝爾和平獎，卻沒能解決中美貿易逆差的問題；如果要論個人榮譽，美斯也拿過好多次金球獎，在一些人眼中或許比奧巴馬更成功。
